price: نو چا چې كفر كړى د خپلې هغې ورځې له امله تباهي ورپېښه ده كومه چې ژمنه يې ورسره كيږي.
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimu alladhī yūʿadūna
